Basic concepts of quasispecies simulation 1 Simple first simulation 1.1 Last Generation

Basic concepts of quasispecies simulation 1 Simple first simulation A first simulation to demonstrate the process and the measuring tools. Table 1.1 shows the configuration that was used to call sim_pop from the yasss package. A high level summary of the entire genealogy is provided in Table 1.2.
